text: what's going on guys today we're talking
about sakiro Shadows die twice and if
it's worth your time and most
importantly worth your money in 2024 to
answer this we first need to know what
is sakiro Shadows die twice and why
should I play it sakiro Shadows die
twice is is an action adventure game
developed by from software the famous
developers of the Dark Souls game
bloodborne demon souls and most recently
Elden ring it was released in March 2019
for PlayStation 4 Xbox One and PC the
game is known for its challenging combat
and I mean really challenging combat the
learning curve for the combat in this
game is pretty crazy when starting this
game player assumes the role of wolf a
Shinobi who serves as a protector to a
young Lord named kururu kururu possesses
a unique bloodline that grants him
immortality the story kicks off when the
Asha Clan attacks and kidnaps kururu to
harness his blood's power if you're
someone who's never played one of these
games I highly recommend you stick
around until the end of the video
because we will be answering the most
important question is sakuro Shadows die
twice worth buying in 2024 to answer
that let's dive straight into
it honestly the best part about this
game is the combat you can do some
pretty cool things with it it's really
fast-paced and unique I don't think I've
ever played a game with such a polished
combat system it's centered around
precise swords play players use a katana
for both offense and defense in this
game pairing is crucial well time blocks
can break an enemy's posture leaving
them vulnerable to a death blow posture
is the bar you see above an enemy's head
and with bosses it's on the top of the
screen breaking an enemy's posture opens
them up for a death blow allowing for
quicker eliminations when I first
started playing this game I didn't know
how I felt about the posture system but
it actually really grown on me and I
really ended up enjoying it a lot it's
just so satisfying when you break an
enemy's posture and you finish them off
rather than chipping away at a boss's
health for an hour just to die when he's
one shot also whenever your health is
low your posture recovery time is
decreased so if you want your posture to
recover fast just don't take damage it's
that simple right you also run around
with a prosthetic arm because well
spoilers you lose your arm in the first
2 minutes of the game Wolf's prosthetic
arm is a versatile tool it can be
equipped with various prosthetic tools
like a grappling hook shurikens flame
vent you can find different tools by
just playing the game and throughout the
world players can switch between
different prosthetic tools to adapt to
different combat situations the setting
for this game is really cool this game
is set in a dark and Atmospheric world I
was going to talk more about the game
setting but honestly I think you should
just go and experience it for yourself
this game feels and looks amazing I
don't think I have anything negative to
say about this game if there's any
negative things about the game you guys
don't like I'd love to hear about them
in the comments but for me honestly I
can't think of one thing I did not like
about this game maybe just dying like a
hundred times for a boss but that's just
cuz I suck at the game the thing that
really separates this game from other
Souls game is the stealth stealth is a
significant aspect of the game it's just
so satisfying when you can just sneak up
on an enemy and kill him instantly
because trust me you fight a large group
of enemies multiple times in this game
so if I were you I'd tried to do that
you'll thank me later also for tanky
enemies you can sneak up on them and get
rid of one health bar right away which
is really
helpful but we all know what the big
question is when it comes to souls games
are the boss fights good well yes
they're actually amazing I loved every
single boss fight even if I did die a
100 times each boss just feels unique
and has its own unique attack patterns
that you need to learn to beat these
bosses it requires a combination of
strategy and skill to defeat them there
were just so many times I just stopped
stopped to appreciate how cool the boss
was that I was fighting even if he was
whooping my butt 100 times that's when
you know you have some good boss fights
these are easily the hardest bosses I
fought in a Souls light game especially
the last boss of the game I still
haven't beat that dude and I'm probably
at 300 attempts if you want to beat
these bosses and just have to push
through the Rage of dying a 100 times
but hey if you're looking for a
challenge this game's for you in
conclusion sakiro Shadow die twice is a
game that stands out for its demanding
combat system requiring a high level of
skill and adaptability from players if
you're not accustomed to challenging
games this might not be ideal for you
but assuming you're watching this video
and you made it to this point you like
the challenge however the game's unique
and rewarding experience coupled with
its Rich narrative atmospheric world and
intense boss battles makes it a must try
for those who enjoy games that push
their skill even if you haven't excelled
in similar games before giving sakuro a
chance could lead to a surprising and
satisfying gaming experience there's a
good reason this game won game of the
year in 2019 I enjoyed every second of
my playthrough and I'm sure you guys
will enjoy this game too but that's
going to do it for this review guys if
